title: Dasho Exams – Digital Assessment Cloud
description: A white-label platform for institutes to create, deliver, and proctor high-stakes exams entirely online.
details: Institutes configure exam patterns, question banks, schedules, access rules, and proctoring thresholds from a single dashboard. Students receive personalized links, complete their exams online with built-in webcam oversight, and every incident is logged for compliance review.
challenges: Proctoring without student software
Complex scoring, simple authoring
Strong security, seamless experience
outcomes: 40% faster exam setup
Camera-off cheating blocked
Zero live exam surprises

title: Train Simulator POC
description: A high-fidelity POC train simulator featuring a 1km Indian railway route, a detailed WAP-7 locomotive with an interactive cockpit, and authentic environments for AI training.
shortDescription: Indian Railway Simulator with interactive cockpit and realistic physics.
details: The simulator features an open-world environment with daylight settings, Indian terrain vegetation, and authentic railway infrastructure including electrified tracks and signaling systems. The WAP-7 locomotive includes a fully interactive cockpit with functional throttle, braking systems, and dynamic dashboard displays. Core mechanics include realistic train physics with momentum and friction, speed simulation, and basic signaling with visual HUD displaying speed, throttle percentage, and directional information.
challenges: Achieving authentic Indian railway environmental and station details
Implementing realistic train momentum and braking physics
Creating a high-fidelity, interactive cockpit dashboard
Optimizing performance for highly detailed environments
outcomes: Delivered a functional POC with an authentic Indian railway environment
Built a foundation for AI simulation and training programs
Implemented realistic train physics and interactive cockpit controls
Created a scalable system for future VR and route expansion

title: Odia OCR - Voter ID Data Extraction System
description: A comprehensive data extraction system that processes image-based Odia voter ID PDFs from 147 constituencies, converts them to searchable text using OCR technology, and transforms the unstructured data into organized Excel files with voter demographics and identification details.
shortDescription: Python-based OCR pipeline to extract voter details from 147 constituency PDFs into structured Excel format.
client: Anthem Globan Technology Services PVT. LTD.
details: The system followed a structured data processing pipeline beginning with PDF to image conversion and preprocessing to enhance quality for OCR. This was followed by specialized Odia text extraction to handle the regional script. The raw text then underwent detailed parsing to identify and separate key voter details including full name, relative's name, relation, age, gender, and voter ID number. A comprehensive validation and cleaning phase ensured data accuracy by correcting errors and standardizing formats. Finally, the processed data was systematically organized into structured Excel files with properly formatted columns for easy analysis and usage.
challenges: Low initial OCR accuracy due to poor image quality and complex Odia script characters
Inconsistent data formatting across different constituency documents
Handling relationship terminology variations and name parsing complexities
Data validation and duplicate identification in large datasets
outcomes: Successfully processed 147 constituency PDFs within 15-day deadline
Achieved significant accuracy improvement through multiple optimization cycles
Created searchable, structured database from previously inaccessible image-based data
Enabled data analysis and reporting capabilities for voter demographic studies

title: NN Engineers Corporate Website
description: A performant, SEO-friendly React application with custom CSS that presents NN Engineers’ services, sectors, certifications, past projects, and contact channels. Emphasis on clear information architecture, fast load, and mobile responsiveness for lead generation.
shortDescription: React-based corporate site showcasing engineering services, projects, and certifications.
details: A full-featured, enterprise-grade corporate web platform designed to serve as the central digital hub for a professional organization. The system is architected with a modular section-based structure, encompassing a dynamic homepage with hero visuals and client social proof, a detailed services catalog broken down by categories and industry-specific use cases, and an interactive, filterable project portfolio for showcasing completed work. It further includes comprehensive 'About Us' pages for company narrative and leadership bios, a dedicated area for highlighting industry certifications and compliance standards, and a multi-channel contact section integrated with lead capture forms and interactive maps. The entire interface is constructed with a custom, brand-consistent component library ensuring a seamless user experience across all devices, complemented by print-optimized styles for professional documentation and marketing collateral.
challenges: Balancing visual hierarchy with dense technical content
Ensuring responsive grids for services and projects across breakpoints
Maintaining SEO signals in a CSR React app
outcomes: Clear lead funnels from services and project pages
Reduced bounce with faster first paint and optimized assets
Maintainable CSS architecture for future growth

title: ISKCON Baranga‑Patia Digital Platform
description: A unified web platform for ISKCON Baranga-Patia featuring event participation, seva registration, multi-tier donations, and spiritual resources with a responsive design.
shortDescription: End‑to‑end Next.js platform for programs, community engagement, donations, and events.
client: ISKCON Baranga‑Patia (Sri Sri Radha Nilamadhava Temple)
details: The platform features a comprehensive home page with CTAs, introductory content, inspirational quotes, event highlights, and newsletter signup. The Connect hub centralizes participation in Temple Services, Youth Forum, Kids’ Corner, Bhakti Steps, Sunday Programs, and House Programs, each with slideshows and external signup links. A streamlined donation system offers 12 seva categories with fixed tiers or custom amounts, supporting both monthly and one-time contributions via UPI QR codes or bank transfer details with a convenient copy-to-clipboard function. Event listings are dynamically powered by API fetching with built-in graceful fallbacks. Shared UI components include a unified header, responsive mobile and desktop menus, hero sections, carousels, animate-on-view effects, countdown timers, and a persistent WhatsApp button for easy communication.
challenges: Designing a flexible donation model supporting fixed tiers, custom amounts, and monthly options
Ensuring performance and accessibility across rich media (slideshows, carousels, animations)
Maintaining consistent branding and readability across many new components and sections
outcomes: Clear user journeys for learning, connecting, and contributing
Faster donation completion with UPI QR and copy‑to‑clipboard banking
Modular component architecture enabling rapid future additions

title: Rafinity AI Healthcare Agent
description: A modern healthcare platform built with Next.js and Django, featuring patient/doctor portals, FHIR data, and secure authentication.
shortDescription: Secure healthcare platform with patient/doctor portals.
details:
- Authentication: OAuth2 PKCE with secure token storage, refresh, and route protection.
- Patient Portal: Longevity score, 8-category health metrics, lab results with reference ranges, document upload (PDF), and trends.
- Doctor Portal: Patient list, scheduling, care plans, medication requests, and task management.
- Care Management: FHIR CarePlan parsing for milestones, medications, and activities.
- Data & Content: Explore (biomarkers, risk flags), Learn (education from FHIR Communication).
- Backend: Django API, Medplum integration layer, webhook proxy, PostgreSQL.
- DevOps: Gunicorn + Nginx, environment-driven config, production-ready deployment.
challenges: Complex FHIR resource parsing and normalization across Patient, Observation, CarePlan, DocumentReference.
Multiple auth flows (patient vs practitioner) with secure OAuth2 PKCE and system tokens.
Real-time health metrics computation from heterogeneous Observation data.
Consistent responsive UI at various zoom levels with a Figma-accurate design system.
Reliable fallbacks when external APIs are temporarily unavailable.
outcomes: End-to-end FHIR-compliant platform with robust error handling and fallbacks.
Multi-role access with protected routes and session management.
Real-time dashboards for patients and doctors with actionable insights.
Care plan and task system improving care coordination and adherence.
Production deployment with optimized performance and scalable architecture.

title: Sushrusa E-Clinic - Rural Healthcare Revolution
description: Comprehensive telemedicine platform delivering 24/7 superspeciality healthcare to rural India through video consultations, prescription management, and integrated care workflows
shortDescription: Telemedicine bridges rural India with superspeciality care
details:
Sushrusa E-Clinic is a comprehensive telemedicine platform that brings specialist healthcare to rural India through digital technology.

The platform enables:
- High-quality video consultations with specialist doctors
- Digital prescription management and medical records
- Easy patient registration and appointment scheduling
- Secure doctor-patient communication system
- Automated SMS reminders and notifications
- Administrative dashboard for healthcare management

Built with modern web technologies, the system ensures secure data handling, smooth user experience across all devices, and reliable performance for both patients and healthcare providers.
challenges: Ensuring reliable video connectivity in rural areas with limited internet infrastructure
Building trust with patients unfamiliar with digital healthcare
Managing complex multi-role authentication and authorization
Integrating multiple payment gateways for diverse user preferences
Scaling real-time features for thousands of concurrent consultations
Creating intuitive UX for users with varying technical literacy levels
outcomes: Successfully connected 10,000+ rural patients to superspeciality care
Achieved 4.9/5 patient satisfaction rating with 10k+ reviews
Reduced healthcare access time from days to minutes
Implemented 24/7 superspecialist availability across India
Built comprehensive admin dashboard for efficient platform management

title: Abriella Paintings
description: A custom e-commerce platform for an art gallery, featuring secure payment processing, inventory management, and virtual art viewing.
team: 3 developers, 2 designers, 1 art consultant, 1 project manager
details:
We developed a specialized e-commerce website for Abriella Paintings, an art gallery looking to expand its reach through online sales. The platform combines beautiful aesthetics with robust e-commerce functionality, creating an engaging online experience that showcases artwork effectively while facilitating secure transactions.

Key features include high-resolution artwork displays with zoom capabilities, virtual gallery tours, secure payment processing with multiple options, inventory and order management, artist profiles and storytelling, artwork authentication certificates, shipping and handling for delicate items, and customer relationship management. The platform also includes marketing tools and analytics for business growth.

We built this solution using Next.js for the frontend interface, Node.js for the backend API, MongoDB for data storage, Stripe for payment processing, and AWS S3 for storing high-resolution images. Three.js powers the virtual gallery experience, allowing customers to explore artworks in a simulated gallery environment.
challenges: Creating a platform that showcases artwork with appropriate detail and context
Implementing secure handling of high-value transactions
Developing logistics solutions for fragile and valuable items
Balancing aesthetic design with e-commerce functionality
Building an engaging virtual gallery experience
outcomes: Expanded market reach beyond physical gallery limitations
Increased sales by 150% within the first six months
Enhanced artist exposure and storytelling capabilities
Positive customer feedback on the virtual art browsing experience
Streamlined inventory and order management processes

title: Health Institute IT
description: Comprehensive IT infrastructure management and digital marketing services for a leading health science institute.
team: 4 IT specialists, 3 digital marketers, 1 designer, 1 content creator, 1 project manager
details:
This project provided comprehensive IT infrastructure management and digital marketing services for the Institute of Health Science in Bhubaneswar. Our solution encompassed both technical infrastructure support and strategic digital marketing initiatives to enhance the institute's operations and online presence.

The IT infrastructure components included network design and implementation, server management and maintenance, cloud migration and management, endpoint device management, cybersecurity implementation, and helpdesk support services. The digital marketing aspects covered website redesign and optimization, content strategy and creation, social media management, email marketing campaigns, SEO and SEM implementation, and performance analytics and reporting.

We utilized AWS for cloud infrastructure, Microsoft 365 for productivity and collaboration, WordPress for website management, Google Analytics for performance tracking, and HubSpot for marketing automation. Cisco networking equipment and VMware virtualization provided the foundation for the on-premises infrastructure.
challenges: Integrating diverse IT systems while ensuring security and compliance
Developing healthcare-specific digital marketing strategies
Balancing technical infrastructure needs with marketing objectives
Training staff on new systems and digital marketing best practices
Ensuring compliance with healthcare data regulations
outcomes: Modernized IT infrastructure with 99.9% uptime
200% increase in website traffic and online inquiries
Improved operational efficiency through streamlined IT systems
Enhanced digital presence and brand recognition in the healthcare sector
Reduced IT support tickets by 60% through proactive management

title: EAtech Monitoring
description: Implementing and configuring server infrastructure with a comprehensive monitoring dashboard for real-time performance tracking and alerts.
team: 3 DevOps engineers, 1 frontend developer, 1 designer, 1 project manager
details:
This project for EAtech involved the installation and configuration of server infrastructure along with the development of a comprehensive monitoring dashboard. The solution provides real-time visibility into server performance, resource utilization, and system health, enabling proactive management and rapid response to potential issues.

Key components included server hardware selection and installation, operating system configuration and hardening, network setup and security implementation, monitoring agent deployment, and the development of a custom dashboard with real-time metrics, historical data analysis, alerting and notification systems, and automated reporting. The solution also features predictive analytics for capacity planning.

We implemented this system using Grafana for visualization dashboards, Prometheus for metrics collection and storage, Docker for containerization, Kubernetes for orchestration, and Node.js for custom backend services. Terraform was used for infrastructure as code, ensuring consistent and repeatable deployments. Custom components were developed in Go for performance-critical monitoring agents.
challenges: Designing a monitoring system that balances detail with usability
Implementing effective alerting without causing alert fatigue
Ensuring minimal performance impact from monitoring agents
Creating visualizations that communicate complex metrics clearly
Building a scalable system that can grow with the infrastructure
outcomes: Reduced server downtime by 85% through proactive monitoring
Improved resource utilization and performance optimization
Enhanced security posture with early detection of anomalies
Significant cost savings through optimized resource allocation
Established a foundation for predictive maintenance and scaling

title: Assertive US Crypto
description: Creating a custom cryptocurrency and blockchain infrastructure for Assertive US, including wallet systems and exchange integration.
team: 4 blockchain developers, 2 frontend developers, 1 designer, 1 security specialist, 1 project manager
details:
This project involved the development of a custom cryptocurrency and supporting blockchain infrastructure for Assertive US. We created a comprehensive solution that includes the cryptocurrency token, secure wallet systems, and integration with exchange platforms, providing a complete ecosystem for the client's digital currency needs.

Key components of the project included smart contract development for the ERC-20 token, a secure and user-friendly wallet application for desktop and mobile devices, exchange listing and liquidity provision, blockchain explorer for transaction transparency, and comprehensive documentation and support. We also implemented robust security measures to protect against common vulnerabilities and attacks.

The technical implementation utilized Solidity for smart contract development, Web3.js and Ethers.js for blockchain interaction, React for frontend interfaces, Node.js for backend services, and AWS for cloud infrastructure. Hardhat provided the development, testing, and deployment framework for the smart contracts.
challenges: Ensuring robust security for financial transactions and assets
Designing a scalable blockchain architecture for future growth
Implementing regulatory compliance features for financial services
Creating intuitive interfaces for users new to cryptocurrency
Establishing reliable exchange integrations and liquidity
outcomes: Successfully launched cryptocurrency with stable market performance
Developed secure wallet system with zero security incidents
Achieved integration with multiple cryptocurrency exchanges
Established a growing user base with positive adoption metrics
Created a foundation for future blockchain-based services

title: Llama3 Industry AI
description: Fine-tuning and optimizing the Llama3 large language model for specialized applications in healthcare, legal, and financial sectors.
team: 3 ML engineers, 2 data scientists, 3 domain experts, 1 project manager
details:
This project focused on enhancing the performance of the Llama3 large language model for specific industry applications, particularly in healthcare, legal, and financial sectors. By fine-tuning the model with domain-specific data and optimizing its parameters, we created specialized versions that deliver more accurate, relevant, and compliant outputs for professional use cases.

Our approach included domain-specific fine-tuning with curated datasets, parameter-efficient training techniques, context length optimization, domain-specific evaluation frameworks, and deployment optimization for production environments. We also implemented guardrails to ensure compliance with industry regulations and ethical guidelines.

The technical implementation utilized Python and PyTorch for model training and fine-tuning, CUDA for GPU acceleration, Hugging Face's Transformers library for model management, and AWS infrastructure for scalable computing resources. FastAPI powers the model serving API, while Docker containers ensure consistent deployment across environments.
challenges: Acquiring and curating high-quality domain-specific training data
Balancing model performance with computational efficiency
Ensuring compliance with industry-specific regulations and standards
Developing accurate evaluation metrics for specialized use cases
Creating effective guardrails for responsible AI deployment
outcomes: 30-45% improvement in domain-specific task performance
Reduced hallucinations and factual errors in specialized contexts
Successfully deployed in production environments across multiple industries
Positive feedback from domain experts on output quality and relevance
Established framework for ongoing model improvements and updates

title: DSpace Court System
description: A comprehensive document management system designed specifically for district courts to digitize and streamline legal document workflows.
team: 7 developers, 1 designer, 2 legal consultants, 1 project manager
details:
The DSpace Document Management System for District Courts is a specialized solution designed to digitize, organize, and streamline the management of legal documents within the judicial system. This comprehensive platform addresses the unique challenges of court document management, including security, accessibility, and compliance with legal standards.

Key features include secure document storage and retrieval, advanced search capabilities with legal metadata, workflow automation for document processing, role-based access control, digital signature integration, audit trails for document access and modifications, and integration with existing court management systems. The solution also includes reporting and analytics for case management insights.

The technical implementation uses Java with Spring Boot for the backend services, Angular for the frontend interface, PostgreSQL for relational data storage, and Elasticsearch for powerful document indexing and search. The entire system is containerized using Docker and orchestrated with Kubernetes for consistent deployment, scaling, and management.
challenges: Ensuring strict security and confidentiality for sensitive legal documents
Implementing complex workflow processes that match court procedures
Creating an intuitive interface for users with varying technical skills
Developing a scalable system to handle millions of documents
Ensuring compliance with legal standards and regulations
outcomes: Reduced document processing time by 60% in district courts
Improved accessibility of legal documents for authorized personnel
Enhanced security and compliance with legal document standards
Significant reduction in paper usage and physical storage requirements
Streamlined court processes leading to faster case resolution

title: DashoApp Web Platform
description: A robust web platform for educational institutions to manage administrative tasks, academic operations, and institutional resources efficiently.
client: DiracAI Private Limited / In House project
team: 8 full-stack developers, 3 UI/UX designers, 2 DevOps engineers, 1 product manager
details:
DashoApp Web Platform is an enterprise-grade web application designed to serve as the central nervous system for educational institutions. Built to complement the mobile experience, the web platform offers comprehensive administrative controls, advanced analytics, and institutional management capabilities that empower educational administrators to run their institutions more efficiently.

The platform features a multi-tenant architecture that allows multiple institutions to operate independently while sharing the same infrastructure. Key modules include student information system (SIS), learning management system (LMS), fee management, human resources, inventory management, and comprehensive reporting and analytics.

We developed DashoApp Web Platform using React.js with TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience. The backend is built with Node.js and Express, with PostgreSQL as the primary database for complex relational data. Redis is used for caching and session management, while AWS services ensure scalability and reliability. The platform features role-based access control, real-time notifications, and comprehensive audit logging.
challenges: Building a scalable multi-tenant architecture for diverse institutions
Handling complex relational data for academic and administrative operations
Ensuring data security and privacy compliance for educational institutions
Creating intuitive interfaces for non-technical administrative staff
Integrating with multiple third-party systems and payment gateways
outcomes: 65% reduction in manual administrative tasks and paperwork
Real-time access to institutional data and performance metrics
Improved decision-making through comprehensive analytics and reporting
Seamless integration with existing institutional systems and processes
Successful adoption across 100+ educational institutions of varying sizes

title: HelloToppers
description: An educational platform connecting students with top performers and mentors for personalized guidance and support.
team: 6 developers, 1 designer, 1 education specialist, 1 project manager
details:
HelloToppers is an innovative educational platform that connects students with top academic performers and experienced mentors for personalized guidance and support. The platform facilitates knowledge sharing, doubt resolution, and mentorship through various communication channels, helping students achieve their academic goals.

Key features include mentor matching based on subject expertise and learning needs, one-on-one video consultations, doubt resolution forums, resource sharing, study group formation, and progress tracking. The platform serves students across different educational levels, from high school to postgraduate studies.

The technical architecture consists of a React frontend for the user interface, Node.js with Express for the backend API, MongoDB for data storage, WebRTC for real-time video communication, and Socket.io for real-time messaging. AWS provides the scalable cloud infrastructure for handling concurrent video sessions and storing educational resources.
challenges: Creating an effective matching algorithm for students and mentors
Implementing secure and reliable video consultation features
Building a scalable platform to handle growing user numbers
Ensuring quality control for mentorship and educational content
Developing a fair and transparent rating system for mentors
outcomes: Connected thousands of students with qualified mentors
Improved academic performance for 80% of active users
Created a thriving educational community with active participation
Expanded to cover multiple educational boards and curricula
Positive feedback from both students and mentors

title: Nijje Self-Learning App
description: An innovative mobile application that personalizes learning experiences using AI and adaptive learning technologies.
team: 5 developers, 2 data scientists, 2 content specialists, 1 designer, 1 project manager
details:
Nijje is an innovative self-learning application that leverages artificial intelligence to create personalized educational experiences. The app adapts to each user's learning style, pace, and preferences, providing customized content and exercises to optimize knowledge retention and skill development.

The application features adaptive learning paths that adjust based on user performance, interactive exercises and quizzes, progress tracking and analytics, spaced repetition for improved retention, and content recommendations based on learning patterns. It covers various subjects and skill areas, making it versatile for different learning goals.

The technical implementation uses Flutter for cross-platform mobile development, providing a smooth and responsive user interface. The backend is powered by Python with FastAPI, while the AI and machine learning components are built using TensorFlow. Firebase handles real-time data synchronization and user authentication, and AWS provides the scalable infrastructure for content delivery and analytics processing.
challenges: Developing accurate AI algorithms for personalized learning paths
Creating engaging and effective learning content for diverse subjects
Implementing adaptive difficulty scaling based on user performance
Ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience across devices
Building a content recommendation system that balances learning goals with engagement
outcomes: Improved learning outcomes with 40% better knowledge retention
Increased user engagement with 3x longer average session duration
Positive user feedback with 4.7/5 rating on app stores
Growing user base with strong word-of-mouth recommendations
Successful implementation across multiple educational domains

title: DI Invoice
description: A customizable invoice generation system that streamlines billing processes for businesses of all sizes.
shortDescription: A free, production-ready SaaS invoicing platform to create organizations, add customers, generate GST-ready invoices, track payments, and manage billing with ease.
details:
Di Invoice is a complete, cloud-based invoicing solution built to deliver a smooth and professional billing experience for organizations worldwide. Designed with a modern SaaS architecture, it empowers businesses to create, manage, and track invoices with unmatched ease.

Users can set up their organization in minutes, add unlimited customers, and begin generating GST-compliant invoices instantly. The invoice builder offers full flexibility—custom items, quantities, rates, taxes, discounts, due dates, and payment status updates. Multiple sleek templates ensure your invoices always look polished and business-ready.

Beyond invoice creation, the platform provides powerful customer and billing management. Every customer has a detailed profile with invoice history, outstanding balances, and contact information. The analytics dashboard gives real-time insights into total sales, revenue trends, pending payments, and full invoice activity—helping businesses take smarter financial decisions.

Invoices can be downloaded, exported as PDFs, or printed in one click. Automatic tax calculation ensures accuracy, while secure data storage keeps customer information safe.

What makes Di Invoice unique is its accessibility—it is completely free, with no subscriptions, limits, or hidden fees. Built at production level, it can serve freelancers, agencies, small businesses, and large organizations alike.

Trusted by thousands of users, Di Invoice delivers professional invoicing made simple, fast, and globally usable.
challenges: Creating flexible invoice templates that meet diverse business needs
Implementing secure payment processing and financial data handling
Designing an intuitive user interface for complex financial operations
Ensuring accurate tax calculations for different jurisdictions
Building a scalable system that works for businesses of all sizes
outcomes: Reduced invoice processing time by 70%
Improved payment collection rates by 35%
Enhanced financial visibility through comprehensive reporting
Positive user feedback, with businesses reporting significant time savings
Successful integration with existing accounting systems

title: No-Code Trading Platform
description: A sophisticated no-code platform that allows traders to create, test, and optimize trading strategies without programming knowledge.
team: 8 developers, 2 data scientists, 2 designers, 1 project manager
details:
Our No-Code Trading Platform revolutionizes the way traders develop and optimize their strategies by eliminating the need for programming knowledge. This innovative platform provides a visual interface for creating complex trading algorithms, backtesting them against historical data, and deploying them in live markets.

The platform incorporates advanced features such as drag-and-drop strategy building, comprehensive backtesting with detailed performance metrics, strategy optimization using machine learning, and seamless deployment to live trading environments. It supports multiple asset classes, including stocks, forex, cryptocurrencies, and futures, making it versatile for different trading styles.

The architecture consists of a React frontend for the visual strategy builder and dashboard, a Python backend for the analytics engine and ML optimization, and a scalable AWS infrastructure for handling large datasets and concurrent backtesting jobs. The entire system is containerized using Docker for consistent deployment and scaling.
challenges: Creating an intuitive visual interface for complex trading logic
Ensuring accurate backtesting with realistic market conditions
Implementing machine learning for strategy optimization
Building a scalable infrastructure for processing large datasets
Maintaining low latency for real-time trading operations
outcomes: Democratized algorithmic trading for non-technical traders
Reduced strategy development time by 80%
Improved trading performance through ML-based optimization
Scalable platform supporting thousands of concurrent users
Positive ROI for 78% of active users

title: DashoApp Mobile App
description: A comprehensive mobile application for educational institutions to manage students, courses, and resources.
details:
DashoApp is a comprehensive mobile application designed specifically for educational institutions to streamline administrative tasks, enhance communication, and improve the overall learning experience. The app provides a unified platform for students, teachers, and administrators to access course materials, track attendance, submit assignments, view grades, and communicate effectively.

The application features a modular architecture that allows educational institutions to customize the platform according to their specific needs. Key modules include student management, course management, attendance tracking, assignment submission and grading, communication tools, and analytics dashboards.

We developed DashoApp using React Native for cross-platform compatibility, ensuring a consistent user experience across iOS and Android devices. The backend is powered by Node.js and MongoDB, providing a scalable and flexible foundation for the application. Firebase was integrated for real-time data synchronization, push notifications, and authentication.
challenges: Creating a unified platform for diverse educational workflows.
Ensuring real-time data synchronization across devices.
Implementing robust security for sensitive educational data.
Designing an intuitive interface for users of all technical abilities.
Optimizing performance for areas with limited connectivity.
outcomes: 50% reduction in administrative workload for educational institutions.
Improved communication between students, teachers, and administrators.
Enhanced accessibility to educational resources and materials.
Positive feedback from users, with a 4.8/5 rating on app stores.
Successful deployment across 50+ educational institutions.
